thread.title: Melania Trump Gets the Last Laugh After Liberal Designers Refuse to Dress Her…
thread.title_full: Melania Trump Gets the Last Laugh After Liberal Designers Refuse to Dress Her…

author: Nickarama
title: Melania Trump Gets the Last Laugh After Liberal Designers Refuse to Dress Her…
text:
07:59pm January 10, 2017   
Some leftist designers had been trying to push a movement not to design for Melania Trump. 
But it seems that effort is failing. 
Several designers are willing to design for her for the inauguration. 
From Conservative Tribune : 
“While Tom Ford and Marc Jacobs have declared that they wouldn’t want her in their pricey duds, there are plenty other designers who would kill to get their designs on her, says socialite and philanthropist Jean Shafiroff, who rubbed elbows with the Trumps at Mar-a-Lago during the New Year’s Eve fete there,” the Post wrote. 
“Shafiroff, whose own closet is filled with Oscar de la Renta, tells The Post that Zac Posen, B. Michael America, Victor de Souza and Zang Toi would all be thrilled to dress America’s first lady,” the paper added. 
Any designer who dresses her will get enormous press,” Shafiroff told the newspaper. 
Most designers would love to get the press of having the First Lady wearing one of their gowns, especially someone who is likely to be a fashion trendsetter like Melania Trump. 
But imagine people on the left being so petty that they can’t even handle people dressing Melania. 
One of Melania Trump’s favorite designers, Stefano Gabbana, has made it clear that he is not stopped by leftist tactics. 
He proudly posted a picture of her on Instagram, taken at her New Year’s Eve party. 
He said how thankful he was that she wore his dress. 
Sounds like boycott attempt is going up in smoke. 
Who ever thought just the wearing of a dress would be part of a culture war? LIKE this article?
